body:
Comment 1: 
Some thought was put into the naming of strconv. In short:
  - the names are short and consistent,
  - their meaning is well understood,
  - "Itoa" reads better IMO than "Itos",
  - the capitalization was chosen to be easy-to-remember ("is it IToA or ItoA?"),
  - this bike shed has already been painted - let's not do it again.

Andrew
_Labels changed: added **packagechange**._ _Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
